page.title: Wal-Mart Keeps Same-Store Sales Outlook
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - Wal-Mart Stores Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=WMT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">WMT.N</A>, the world's largest retailer, said on Saturday it still sees a 2 to 4 percent increase in October sales at its stores open at least a year.
